sentences.en: At stake are more than 20,000 jobs in Britain's aerospace sector.
sentences.cn: 英国航天部门2万多人面临失业的危险。

sentences.en: British Aerospace has won an order worth 340 million dollars.
sentences.cn: 英国宇航公司已经赢得了3.4亿美元的订单。

sentences.en: British Aerospace reckon that the plane will be commercially viable if 400 can be sold.
sentences.cn: 英国航空航天公司估计这个型号的飞机如果能卖出400架，就可实现盈利。

sentences.en: Edward Murphy was an aerospace engineer for the US Army.
sentences.cn: 爱德华·墨菲是一名美军的航宇工程师.

sentences.en: He's an aerospace engineer, and works for Orlando Aircraft Corporation.
sentences.cn: 他担任航太工程师, 为Orlando飞机公司工作.

sentences.en: In the context of the modern aerospace industry these problems are seldom simple or routine.
sentences.cn: 在现代空间工业范畴内,这些问题很少是简单的或常规的问题.

sentences.en: Milling grooves on aerospace rocket engine - nozzle surface is an important process.
sentences.cn: 铣槽加工是大型航天火箭喷管制造中的关键工序.

sentences.en: Piezoelectric intelligent structures have been widely applied in aerospace engineering.
sentences.cn: 压电智能结构在航天、航空工程获得了广泛应用.

sentences.en: Products are widely used in mobile communications, radar, navigation and aerospace fields.
sentences.cn: 产品广泛应用于移动通讯 、 雷达 、 导航以及航空航天等领域.

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.en: The European Commission ruled that British Aerospace should pay back tens of millions of pounds.
sentences.cn: 欧洲委员会裁定英国航空航天公司应该偿还数千万英镑。

sentences.en: The financial concessions granted to British Aerospace were, he said, of a precarious character.
sentences.cn: 他说，向英国宇航公司给予财政优惠未获证实。

sentences.en: The world's entire aerospace industry is feeling the chill winds of recession.
sentences.cn: 全世界的航空航天工业都感受到了经济衰退的寒意。

sentences.en: Widely used in machinery, instruments, vehicles, motorcycles, aviation, aerospace and other fields.
sentences.cn: 广泛应用于机械 、 仪表 、 汽车 、 摩托车 、 航空 、 航天等领域.

trans.tran_cn: 航空与航天空间，宇宙空间（指地球大气层及其外面的空间），航空航天学，航空航天工业
trans.tran_en: the industry that designs and builds aircraft and space vehicles
